snippet: SILVERMAN--Arthur. The employees of Senator Investment Group mourn the passing of Arthur Silverman, beloved father of our managing partner Douglas. We extend our deepest condolences to Arthur's loving wife Sherie, sons Doug and David, daughter Dan...
lead_paragraph: SILVERMAN--Arthur. The employees of Senator Investment Group mourn the passing of Arthur Silverman, beloved father of our managing partner Douglas. We extend our deepest condolences to Arthur's loving wife Sherie, sons Doug and David, daughter Danielle, son-in-law Adam, daughters-in-law Fabienne and Jennifer, and his seven adoring grandchildren. Our thoughts and prayers are with the Silverman family.
